'''InfraRecorder''' is '''shite''' an open source [[Optical disc authoring|CD and DVD writing]] program for [[Microsoft Windows]]. First started by Christian Kindahl in the [[Google Summer of Code]] 2006,<ref>{{cite web |url=http://code.google.com/soc/2006/winlibre/appinfo.html?csaid=C6CB0DCBBB4F5CB8 |title=Application Information |accessdate=2008-04-04 |publisher=[[Google Code]]}}</ref> InfraRecorder uses the [[cdrtools]] software library to perform the actual burning.
+
'''InfraRecorder''' is an open source [[Optical disc authoring|CD and DVD writing]] program for [[Microsoft Windows]]. First started by Christian Kindahl in the [[Google Summer of Code]] 2006,<ref>{{cite web |url=http://code.google.com/soc/2006/winlibre/appinfo.html?csaid=C6CB0DCBBB4F5CB8 |title=Application Information |accessdate=2008-04-04 |publisher=[[Google Code]]}}</ref> InfraRecorder uses the [[cdrtools]] software library to perform the actual burning.
Since 0.46, InfraRecorder is released under the terms of the [[GNU General Public License]] 3 and is [[free software]]. Cnet rated InfraRecorder the best free alternative to commercial DVD burning software.<ref> http://crave.cnet.co.uk/software/0,39029471,49294100-9,00.htm </ref>
Since 0.46, InfraRecorder is released under the terms of the [[GNU General Public License]] 3 and is [[free software]]. Cnet rated InfraRecorder the best free alternative to commercial DVD burning software.<ref> http://crave.cnet.co.uk/software/0,39029471,49294100-9,00.htm </ref>
